channel.title: Docs on TCCW Unofficial Guide
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on TCCW Unofficial Guide

item.title: Members Communities
item.description: Members Communities # Facebook # The Collective Canary Wharf The Collective Book Club WhatsApp # The collective members have created a number of WhatsApp chat groups for communities of interest. Use the links below to join: Board games Book club Buy/sell/swap Climbing/bouldering Collectivism Collective improvements Cooking Foodies LGBT Outdoor adventures/hiking Video games Poker Skillshare # The skillshare sheet can be used to connect with other members:

item.title: FAQ
item.description: My WiFi / internet isn’t working # How to Use OpenDNS or Google DNS on Your Mac My neighbours loudly slam their doors! # Find the offending room number and then raise a service ticket and maintenance will sort it out. How do you turn up the sound in the cinema room? # Contact the hub Can I drink the tap water? # Yes - Report | Thames Water

item.title: Local Area
item.description: Local Area Recommendations # Please add any recommendations for services such as Doctors, Dry Cleaners, Notaries etc. Restaurants and Bars # Royal China for good quality Chinese food incl. dim sum (Westferry) Hazev for delicious Baklava and Turkish tea (South Quay) Supermarkets # The Co-op Tian Tian Market (for Asian produce) Services # Hairdressers # ADAM Grooming Atelier (Canary Wharf) Headcase Barbers (Surrey Quays/Deptford) Nomad Barbers (Brick Lane - City)

item.title: Staff & Contacts
item.description: Staff who’s who # Please update any useful info. about contacts amongst the collective staff: Kenneth Opoku - Community Manager Contacting TCCW # Contact the hub directly # [Preferred] Text them on +44 7723 447 082 (note that the hub do not always seem to respond to emails/phone calls) Visit them in person on the ground floor of TCCW E-mail them hub.cw@thecollective.com Support request system # TCCW Support Requests
